alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:28AM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Ransom and Sargent Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Near blizzard conditions can be expected. The hazardous conditions will impact travel to evening events.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
